ygData.subject: Re: Compiling heritrix 2.0.1
ygData.msgSnippet: Nevermind, I got it to compile using the Maven skip test argument... I launched the binary and heritrix is now listening on localhost:8080. I hope everything

Nevermind, I got it to compile using the Maven skip test argument... I
laun=
ched the binary and heritrix is now listening on localhost:8080. I
hope eve=
rything works smoothly from there :)

On another note, here is the outpout =
of foreground_heritrix... looks
like there is an error in the script.
